channel.title: New project
channel.description:
right i use html and stuff but i want to make games (not rs servers) i want to make games and stuff for my new project
and if u tell me a program or script thats free and tell me a link on where to start learning it
thanks

item.title: New project
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:8, topic:48950”]How would you make a game with links and millions of pages?
Unless you mean something along the lines of those books you used to get, with the “to run away, turn to page 204. To fight, turn to page 202.”[/quote]

Just about, yea. Or, click the button. It redirects you to a page with the button in another position.

Read full topic

item.title: New project
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

You can’t make a game with HTML as Mopman said. Most games you see on websites are Flash…

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: New project
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:6, topic:48950”]No, you can’t.
Where would the logic come from?

HTML is a markup language, not a programming language. It alters the formatting of documents, that’s it.[/quote]
Yea, HTML is a markup language, but that does not mean it cannot be made into a game.
You can make a shitty game with links and millions of web pages. And to the worst extent, you can make something like Kings of Chaos.

Read full topic
